yes®
Use your own CSS to make the yes® button look like any other button.
Use your own CSS to make the yes® button look like any other button.
1.
The button must display the wordmark yes® with the registered trademark symbol all in lowercase letters*.
yes®
2.
*thank you @espiekermann
Always provide context above or besides the yes® button.
For Example:


Login with your Bank
yes®
Login with your Bank
yes®
3.
If legally required add context inside the button after yes®
For Example:
yes® I agree
